// Basic arithmetic
// 200 + 7
000000CF
// 200 - 7
000000C1
// 200 + 123
00000143
// 200 - 123
0000004D

// Unsigned arithmetic
0000FFFF
// -1 - 255 = -256
0000FF00
00007FFF
00017FFE

// Multiplication
0000003C
00007FFF

// -1 * 3 = -3
FFFFFFFD
FFFFFFFF

3FFF8000
80007FFF

// Division
0000000A
00000000

00000021
00000001

FFFFFFDF
00000001

// Bitwise
00000000
00003333
0000FFFF
0000CCCC
0000CCCC
00007777
0000EEEE
FFFF0000

// LO and HI
ABCDEF12
FFFFFFFF

// slt
00000001
00000000
00000001
00000001
00000001
00000000
00000001

// Shift
// sll
80000000
00000002
// sllv
80000000
00000002
00000000
// srl
00000001
40000000
80000000
// srlv
00000001
40000000
00000000
// sra
FFFFFFFF
80000000
00000000
FFFFFFFC
// srav
FFFFFFFF
C0000000
FFFFFFFF

// Jumping and branching
0000AAAA
0000000F
0000000C
000000A0

// Loading/Saving
ABCD5634

00ABCDEF
EF120000

0000EF12
